casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rodney Earl COFFIN. No. 405P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. Winifred H. Dillon, Raleigh, for Rodney Earl Coffin.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006."
